actiontrackingcamera_option_camera_rotat: Can rotate the camera to keep up with the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_show_comment: Show a commentary panel with information about the action
actiontrackingcamera_option_tracking_ret: Draw a reticle around the units being tracked
actiontrackingcamera_option_user_interru: Pause camera tracking when the user moves the mouse etc
areareclaimtrees_option_defaultavoidtree:
Enabling causes area reclaim orders to avoid reclaiming trees and other energy-only features. Reclaim trees by issuing the order centred on a tree or by holding Ctrl.

The behaviour is reversed when disabled, causing orders given with Ctrl held to avoid reclaiming trees.
autogroup_option_addall_desc: Existing units will be added to group N when setting autogroup N.
autogroup_option_immediate_desc: Units built/resurrected/received are added to autogroups immediately instead of waiting them to be idle.
autogroup_option_loadgroups_desc: Preserve auto groupings for next game. Unchecking this clears the groups!
playernametags_option_onlycomms_desc: Name tags will only be shown on Commanders
replaycontrolbuttons_option_visibleprogr: Show progress bar for the replay
